## sdfRound variable

Inline function. Essentially an isoline offset to create:

- `r > 0`<!-- -->: rounded/thicker shapes - `r < 0`<!-- -->: sharper/thinner shapes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sdfRound: (d: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Term<"float">, r: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Term<"float">) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Op2<"float">
```
